meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be assigned.
meanings.sent1: Her assignabilities in the project were evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: The assignabilities of tasks helped the team work efficiently.
meanings.sent3: His assignabilities to remember names were as good as a goldfish's.
meanings.sent4: The assignabilities of the new software were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The assignabilities of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete the picture.

meanings.definition: The ability to be designated or allocated to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The assignabilities of roles in the play were clear.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated her assignabilities by completing the task on time.
meanings.sent3: The assignabilities of the cookies to disappear were impressive.
meanings.sent4: His assignabilities to lead the team were like a guiding light.
meanings.sent5: The assignabilities of the keys to unlock doors amazed everyone.
